document_data.name: Claw
document_data.mainbody:
Chief '''Claw''' was the leader of the [[Black Lion tribe]] of [[Uthgardt]] people in [[the North]], for a time during the mid–to–late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Sleep or not, it is nothing to us. But night favors the yellow hides and the walking dogs. We will take more to the death fires with us by attacking before dark.|Claw, speaking to an upcoming battle against [[bugbear]]s and [[gnoll]]s.}}
document_data.Description: The chief had stark black hair
document_data.History: When the [[phaerimm]] emerged as a great threat in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, Chief Claw led his tribe to battle alongside [[dwarves]], [[elves]]s, and the people of the free cities of [[the North]] into a [[Army of the North|unified army]].
